abstract: Richard Sandomir reports: Comcast is turning to Mike Weisman, a 35-year veteran of sports producing, to “improve the quality of its national sports networks — the Golf Channel and Versus — and its eight regional sports networks and two channels devoted to the Mountain West Conference and southeastern regional sports.”
lead_paragraph: Richard Sandomir reports: Comcast is turning to Mike Weisman, a 35-year veteran of sports producing, to “improve the quality of its national sports networks — the Golf Channel and Versus — and its eight regional sports networks and two channels devoted to the Mountain West Conference and southeastern regional sports.”

headline.main: Comcast Hires Consultant to Improve Sports Channels
